title: Value of consumer credit outstanding in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2001 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars, about 3841.32 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars about 1867.85 was reached at Year 2001
min_summary: In general Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
